content: sts slip_stitch to join 56 sts total for this round round 13 - 16 chain 2 fpdc/bpdc in established ribbing pattern around to end join with a slip_stitch to the top of first fpdc round 17 chain 1 single_crochet 2 together 2xs decrease made single_crochet next 9 sts sc2 together 2xs single_crochet next 11 sts single_crochet 2 together 2xs single_crochet next 9 sts single_crochet 2 together 2xs single_crochet next 11 sts join with a slip_stitch to top of first single_crochet of the round 52 sts total this round round 18 chain 1 single_crochet 2 together 1x single_crochet next 11 sts single_crochet 2 together 1x single_crochet remaining sts around to end slip_stitch to join fasten_off sleeves finished sleeves are 2 please read this section before completing round 1 attach yarn with a slip_stitch to any stitch in the underarm area chain 2 crochet around the arm hole in the established fpdc/bpdc stitch pattern for 28 stitches try to line up fpdc sts with fpdc sts you are working into and bpdc sts with bpdc sts you are working into you may have to add a couple of stitches in order to get a total of 28 i added stitches to my sweater where there 2 was an obvious gap in the underarm you will need to determine what looks best for your sweater round 2 8 chain 2 fpdc/bpdc in each st around join with a slip_stitch round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in each st around to end join with a slip_stitch fasten_off **for second sleeve repeat rounds 1 9 of the sleeve section for the other arm hole finishing  return to the starting tail of the body and close up gap of the foundation double_crochet round with a couple of stitches fasten_off  join yarn to any stitch at the bottom of the body section and add a round of single_crochet crocheting right over the remains of the starting tail join with a slip_stitch fasten_off  weave in all ends place your new sweater on teddy and enjoy direct comments or questions about this pattern to merripurdy@verizon net teddy
